mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM profession WHERE course_type_id = #{courseTypeId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.course_type_id FROM profession p JOIN course_to_profession ctp ON p.profession_id = ctp.profession_id JOIN user_to_course utc ON ctp.course_id = utc.course_id WHERE utc.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT p.course_type_id FROM course c JOIN course_to_profession ctp ON c.course_id = ctp.course_id JOIN profession p ON ctp.profession_id = p.profession_id WHERE c.manager_id = #{userId}
